title: He Who Must Not Be Named in Swing Districts
sub_head: Can Democrats avoid being associated with the president?
body:
Many U.S. voters aren’t inclined to say something nice about President Joe Biden. Many Democratic candidates have decided it’s best to say nothing at all. Fortunately for the president, at least for the moment he appears to be maintaining solid support within the Biden household.
On Friday Sarah Mucha reported for Axios:
